answers.answer: Hi,What kind of worms do you have?,you have to completely eliminate them and prevent reinfection if you want to develop the muscles, as otherwise, they will steal all nutrients that you take.Solace

question: Even though i am weight lifting for four years and eating protein rich foods i am not developing any muscle. i dont have diabetes or high pressure.Once in every three months i have stomach worms for which i take albendazol tablets.
title: muscle
